Field Label: With the subject standing upright with feet together and weight evenly distributed, did the examiner gather the fabric of the subject's pants, holding the sides of the pants snugly, before placing the steel measuring tape around the hips, anchoring the measuring tape at the maximum protuberance of the buttocks?
Did the examiner then release the folds of the pants and then adjust the tape so that it is on a horizontal plane and held snugly but not pulled tight?
